title: Drawing, "Page of a Sketchbook: Showing a Scene of a Cremation", ca. 1590
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and wash on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Vertical rectangle.  Top: Outdoor scene.  The cremation taking place in the center of the composition.  Figures seated and standing in foreground.  Bird flying upper left, another at the feet of the burning figure.  Bottom: Account listing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Page of a Sketchbook: Showing a Scene of a Cremation", ca. 1590.
ca. 1590. Pen and brown ink, brush and wash on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-144.
